## calculateLuminance() function

Calculate relative luminance per WCAG 2.1.

Uses sRGB to linear conversion and ITU-R BT.709 coefficients.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function calculateLuminance(rgb: RGB): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

rgb


</td><td>

[RGB](./chromaterm.rgb.md)


</td><td>

RGB color with values 0-255


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

Luminance value 0-1 (0 = black, 1 = white)
